content: in this legal case the court in pisa has made a final ruling between two parties referred to as ge and ch ge has been awarded full ownership of a property in pisa and chs claims have been declared inadmissible the court has also ordered the cancellation of two mortgages one in favor of equitalia cerit and another in favor of ch ge is entitled to receive a certain amount of money from ch and ch is responsible for reimbursing ge for 50 of the litigation costs the court has considered the arguments and evidence presented by both parties and made a decision based on that
